column1: Uchi////Amazing dining experience. For starters this place does not feel like it is in the middle of a busy street in Houston. For my reservation i sat at the bar & I highly recommend this. The servers were helpful
column3: & very knowledgeable. Â This was a tasting experience & every roll
column6: we tried was 10/10. The popular items listed are a hit & this place just feels like a hidden getaway in the middle of the city. Highly recommend & plan to return.
